job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <ul><li>5+ years designing software and coding professionally</li><li>Computer Science degree preferred</li><li>An interest in the blockchain and cryptocurrency space</li><li>Proficient with Java</li><li>Proficient with a scripting language such as Python, Nodejs and/or PHP</li><li>Comfortable and proficient in a Linux terminal is required</li><li>Experience building and testing microservices with REST, preferably in Java</li><li>Capable of taking a new feature from the software design stage, through the development process, and ship it to production</li><li>Broad knowledge of SQL and relational database design</li><li>Some knowledge of the mechanics of applied cryptography including hashing, randomization, public-key encryption, symmetric encryption, and elliptic curves</li></ul><p></p>
